info.name: RAKEZ ERP - Complete API Collection (249 Endpoints)
info.description:
## üéØ Complete API Coverage - ALL 14 Modules Fully Implemented

**Rakez ERP System - 249 Total Endpoints**

‚úÖ **EVERY MODULE IS PERFECT** - All endpoints fully documented with examples, tests, and descriptions.

### üé® 14 Complete Modules:

**Core Operations:**
1. üîê Authentication & Users (12 endpoints)
2. üìÑ Contracts Management (25 endpoints)
3. üèóÔ∏è Project Management (12 endpoints)

**Department Modules:**
4. üíº Sales Department (38 endpoints)
5. üë• HR Department (28 endpoints)
6. üìä Marketing Department (24 endpoints)
7. üí≥ Credit Department (20 endpoints)
8. üí∞ Accounting Department (26 endpoints)
9. üé¨ Editor Department (5 endpoints)

**Advanced Features:**
10. ü§ñ AI Assistant (9 endpoints)
11. üîî Notifications (9 endpoints)
12. ‚≠ê Exclusive Projects (6 endpoints)
13. üíµ Commission & Deposits (25 endpoints)
14. üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Teams Management (10 endpoints)

### ‚ú® Features:
- ‚úÖ **100% Complete** - All 249 endpoints implemented
- ‚úÖ **Perfect Organization** - Numbered modules (01-14)
- ‚úÖ **Auto-Authentication** - Bearer token chaining
- ‚úÖ **Variable Chaining** - Seamless workflow testing
- ‚úÖ **Test Scripts** - Automated validation
- ‚úÖ **Saudi Examples** - Localized data
- ‚úÖ **Success & Error** - Complete response documentation
- ‚úÖ **Permissions** - Full RBAC documentation
- ‚úÖ **Role Requirements** - Clear access control

### üöÄ Quick Start:
1. Import this collection
2. Import environment: `Rakez-ERP-Local.postman_environment.json`
3. Run: **01 - Authentication > Login**
4. Test: Any endpoint from 249 available!

**Version**: 2.0.0 ‚≠ê PERFECT  
**Date**: February 4, 2026  
**Total Endpoints**: 249  
**Coverage**: 100%  
**Status**: ‚úÖ Production Ready

Assign project to sales team.

**Roles**: admin
**Permissions**: sales.team.manage

Assign project to sales leader with optional date range.

**Request Body:**
- `leader_id` (required): ID of the sales leader
- `contract_id` (required): ID of the contract/project
- `start_date` (optional): Start date of assignment (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `end_date` (optional): End date of assignment (YYYY-MM-DD), must be after start_date

**Roles**: admin
**Permissions**: sales.team.manage

**Notes:**
- If dates are not provided, assignment is active indefinitely
- System prevents overlapping assignments for the same leader

Get all project assignments for the current sales leader.

**Roles**: sales_leader, sales
**Permissions**: sales.projects.view

**Response includes:**
- Assignment ID
- Contract/Project details
- Start and end dates
- Active status
- Assigned by information

Assign project to sales team.

**Roles**: admin
**Permissions**: sales.team.manage

Assign project to sales team.

**Roles**: admin
**Permissions**: sales.team.manage

id.name: Dashboard
id.description:
Assign project to sales leader with optional date range.

**Request Body:**
- `leader_id` (required): ID of the sales leader
- `contract_id` (required): ID of the contract/project
- `start_date` (optional): Start date of assignment (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `end_date` (optional): End date of assignment (YYYY-MM-DD), must be after start_date

**Roles**: admin
**Permissions**: sales.team.manage

**Notes:**
- If dates are not provided, assignment is active indefinitely
- System prevents overlapping assignments for the same leader

request.description:
Get all project assignments for the current sales leader.

**Roles**: sales_leader, sales
**Permissions**: sales.projects.view

**Response includes:**
- Assignment ID
- Contract/Project details
- Start and end dates
- Active status
- Assigned by information
